Text: No commentary for the first 4 minutes. The Giro gremlins are at it again.

Nice last descent mountain stage (emasculated though due to very harsh meteo condition in the oriental Alps), with beautiful scenery and pretty disputed finish.
DeLucas caugth by antidoping team. Good work! 

THank you very much BasilBrush to share this Giro d'Italia 2013. I've seen you already uploaded lots of bike stuff. great!
